backend/main.mo: Canister managing user profiles, app settings, sermon cache, and latest release with access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing features, impacted files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend files including settings, prayer times, weather, and UI utilities.
frontend/docs/android-webview-template.m: Guide and template for embedding the web app in an Android WebView with JavaScript bridge and notifications.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color systems and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry enabling fonts, favicon, Android bridge script, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/android-widget-bridge.js: Standalone JS bridge exposing functions to update Android prayer widgets via WebView’s Android interface.
frontend/src/androidPushBridge.d.ts: Declares the AndroidPush interface for sending expanded prayer time JSON data to the Android WebView wrapper. Includes methods for pushing prayer info used for storage, alarms, notifications, and widgets.
frontend/src/androidWidgetBridge.d.ts: Defines global Android widget bridge functions and the AndroidPrayer interface for updating next, daily, and weekly prayer displays. Provides TypeScript types for prayer items and widget update methods.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering tabs, header, background motifs, and global UI such as weather and update prompts.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Exports a placeholder AuthButton React component that currently renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/HeaderFlourish.t: Renders a decorative centered flourish image for headers, shown only on larger screens.
frontend/src/components/MobileTabsNav.ts: Implements a mobile tab navigation bar with icons, an overflow menu, and content slots for various app sections. Uses the Tabs component system to switch between views.
frontend/src/components/SelectLocationPr: Displays a card prompting the user to select a location, with a button that triggers navigation.
frontend/src/components/TabsOverflowMenu: Provides a dropdown menu listing additional tabs with icons, allowing users to switch to less frequently used sections. Manages open state and triggers tab selection callbacks.
Defines the AdhkarItem type and exports static morning and evening adhkar lists with Arabic text, translations, and repetition counts.
frontend/src/features/adhkar/MorningEven: Renders morning and evening adhkar lists with checkboxes, progress tracking, and reset actions. Integrates user settings to persist completion states.
frontend/src/features/app-release/curren: Defines the current app version string used for update comparisons.
frontend/src/features/app-release/semver: Provides semantic version comparison utilities and a helper to check if a version is newer.
frontend/src/features/app-release/Update: Shows a dismissible alert when a newer backend app version exists and lets users open the store link or dismiss the prompt.
frontend/src/features/app-release/update: Handles storing, retrieving, and clearing dismissed update version info in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useIsC: React Query hook that checks via actor API whether the current user is an admin.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useLat: React Query hook that fetches the latest app release metadata from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/app-release/useUpd: React Query mutation for updating the latest app release and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/duaGuide: Defines dua categories and provides categorized dua datasets with text and metadata.
frontend/src/features/dua-guide/DuaGuide: UI for browsing dua categories, viewing dua lists, and opening detailed dua dialogs.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Card component that displays a single Esmaül Hüsna item and triggers selection on click.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/esmaul: Defines the EsmaulHusnaItem interface and exports an array of Allah’s names with Arabic, transliteration, Turkish meaning, and associated duas.
frontend/src/features/esmaulhusna/Esmaul: Displays a list of Esmaül Hüsna cards and shows detailed info in a dialog when selected.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Fa: React component for tracking voluntary, make-up, and Ramadan fasts with date entry, target management, and settings persistence.
frontend/src/features/fasting-tracker/Ra: Displays Ramadan fasting progress with a 30-day grid, status toggling, and a reset dialog.
frontend/src/features/hatim/HatimTakipTa: Provides Quran reading progress tracking with page input, increment/decrement controls, progress bar, and settings sync.
frontend/src/features/home/currentPrayer: Computes the current prayer slot by comparing the current time to adjusted daily prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/formatRemaini: Formats remaining milliseconds into mm:ss or HH:mm:ss countdown text.
frontend/src/features/home/HomeTab.tsx: Home screen combining location selection, prayer times, weather, next prayer countdown, and widget updates.
frontend/src/features/home/MotifButton.t: Button wrapper adding an Islamic tile pattern overlay while preserving button variants and props.
frontend/src/features/home/MotifFrame.ts: Layout wrapper adding decorative Islamic frame or divider variants around its children.
frontend/src/features/home/NextPrayerCou: Displays the next prayer name, time, and remaining countdown with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/features/home/PrayerTimeCar: Renders a grid of spiritual content cards with modal details based on the current prayer slot.
frontend/src/features/home/SahurIftarStr: Shows sahur and iftar times with a live countdown using adjusted prayer times.
frontend/src/features/home/time-content/: Provides a list of dua items with Arabic text, Turkish translation, and usage context.
Contains a collection of hadith items with Arabic, Turkish, and source metadata.
Defines VerseItem and exports an array of Quran verses with Arabic text, Turkish translations, and references.
frontend/src/features/home/useAndroidPus: React hook that builds detailed prayer time payloads and sends them to AndroidPush, deduplicating updates.
frontend/src/features/home/useAndroidWid: React hook that formats and sends daily, weekly, and city updates to Android widgets while avoiding redundant transmissions.
frontend/src/features/home/useCurrentPra: Tracks the current prayer slot by recalculating every minute and updating only when the slot changes.
frontend/src/features/home/useNextPrayer: Computes the next prayer and a live countdown, updating every second and sending bridge updates when the next prayer changes.
frontend/src/features/home/usePrayerTime: Selects deterministic random verse, hadith, dua, and esma content based on the current prayer slot.
frontend/src/features/home/useSahurIftar: Calculates countdown to sahur or iftar based on fajr and maghrib times, updating every minute.
frontend/src/features/home/WeeklyPrayerT: Displays a weekly timetable of daily prayer times with loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/location/LocationS: Searches and selects a location using geocoding results, saving it to app settings and displaying current selection.
frontend/src/features/location/openMeteo: Wraps Open-Meteo geocoding API search and converts results into internal Location format.
frontend/src/features/location/types.ts: Defines Location and GeocodingResult interfaces used for geocoding and location storage.
frontend/src/features/location/useGeocod: React Query hook that fetches geocoding results when the search text is long enough.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/Nam: Displays namaz tutorial steps and prayer rakat counts with gender-based step selection.
frontend/src/features/namaz-ogretici/nam: Provides structured text content for prayer rakat info and detailed men/women namaz steps.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/dista: Implements Haversine distance calculation and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: Allows searching and selecting a temporary or saved location for nearby mosque lookup.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/nearb: Queries the Overpass API for nearby mosques, extracts names, addresses, distances, and returns a sorted mosque list.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/Nearb: Shows nearby mosques based on active location and allows changing or saving the search location.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/types: Defines the NearbyMosque interface with id, coordinates, distance, and optional address.
frontend/src/features/nearbymosque/useNe: Provides a React Query hook to fetch nearby mosques based on user location and radius.
frontend/src/features/notifications/noti: Contains notification templates for generic and prayer-time alerts with helpers for formatting messages.
frontend/src/features/prayer-tracker/Pra: Renders the prayer tracker UI allowing users to mark daily prayers and manage kaza counters using app settings.
Fetches daily prayer times from the Aladhan API and maps them into a simplified PrayerTimes object.
frontend/src/features/prayer/aladhanWeek: Fetches seven days of prayer times from Aladhan API and formats each day with a Turkish date label.
frontend/src/features/prayer/kerahatTime: Computes kerahat windows and merges them with prayer times into a chronologically sorted list.
frontend/src/features/prayer/PrayerTimes: Displays adjusted prayer times with kerahat windows, handles location and offset settings, and shows related UI.
Applies minute offsets to individual or grouped prayer times with 24‑hour wraparound handling.
frontend/src/features/prayer/usePrayerTi: React Query hook to load daily prayer times based on the selected location.
frontend/src/features/prayer/useWeeklyPr: React Query hook to load weekly prayer times using the user's selected location.
frontend/src/features/qibla/QiblaFinderT: React UI for selecting location and displaying Qibla direction using device orientation and calculated bearings.
frontend/src/features/qibla/qiblaMath.ts: Utility functions to compute Qibla bearing from coordinates using great‑circle math and angle normalization.
frontend/src/features/qibla/useDeviceOri: React hook that retrieves device compass heading, handles iOS permission, and tracks support/loading states.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/qura: Frontend API layer fetching surah metadata, text, translations, and audio from Al-Quran Cloud with caching.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/Qura: Main Qur'an learning tab handling surah list, reader view, audio playback, scrolling, and saved reading state.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/useA: Custom hook managing ayah-by‑ayah audio playback, including loading, errors, autoplay, and navigation.
frontend/src/features/quran-reading/useQ: Hook storing and restoring last read surah, ayah, and scroll position via app settings.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/fastingBas: Static dataset providing headings and paragraphs explaining basic Ramadan fasting rules and practices.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/ramadanMen: Contains a list of 30 daily Ramadan menus with sahur and iftar items.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/RamazanKos: UI tab showing Ramadan info, prayer times, location prompt, and daily menus, with sections for fasting and tarawih content.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/tarawihCon: Static content describing tarawih prayer structure, method, and Ramadan notes.
frontend/src/features/ramazan/useDailyRo: Hook that returns a deterministic daily-rotating menu using the local date and updates at midnight.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/dat: Utility functions for date math: start-of-day, day differences, and Turkish date formatting.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/hij: Converts Hijri events to Gregorian dates for a year by scanning days and matching hijri calendar values.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/rel: Static dataset of 2026 Islamic dates with fixed Gregorian mappings and Turkish names.
Type definitions for Hijri events and computed Gregorian religious day entries.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/Rel: UI tab listing 2026 religious days, highlighting the next upcoming date and marking past ones.
frontend/src/features/religious-days/use: React hook returning 2026 religious days, computing the next upcoming day and days remaining using memoized logic.
frontend/src/features/sermon/CumaHutbesi: Empty file placeholder for Friday sermon tab component.
frontend/src/features/sermon/useLatestSe: Empty file placeholder for latest sermon hook.
frontend/src/features/settings/AdminAppR: Admin-only UI for updating app release version and Play Store URL with validation and success/error handling.
frontend/src/features/settings/appSettin: Type definitions for global app settings, including location, notifications, fasting, Quran progress, and prayer tracking.
frontend/src/features/settings/durableLo: IndexedDB-based storage utilities for persisting and retrieving the user's location with get/set/clear functions.
frontend/src/features/settings/localSett: LocalStorage-backed settings loader with defaults, migration logic, and durable location synchronization.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsT: Settings screen letting users adjust prayer time offsets and notification lead times, saving via app settings hooks.
frontend/src/features/settings/useAppSet: React Query wrapper exposing load/save operations for app settings and merging defaults with stored values.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/tasbihatD: Static array defining tasbihat items with Arabic text, translations, and repeat counts.
frontend/src/features/tasbihat/TasbihatT: UI tab listing post-prayer tasbihat items with Arabic text, transliteration, translation, and counts.
frontend/src/features/weather/CompactWea: Displays a compact weather summary using current location, showing loading state or temperature and description.
frontend/src/features/weather/openMeteoW: Fetches current weather data from Open-Meteo and maps weather codes to human-readable descriptions.
frontend/src/features/weather/useWeather: React Query hook that fetches weather data for a given location with caching and retries.
frontend/src/features/weather/WeatherSec: Renders a detailed weather card with temperature, conditions, wind, and humidity, handling loading and errors.
frontend/src/features/zikirmatik/Zikirma: Implements a digital counter with target setting, progress tracking, and persistent storage via app settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, invalidating related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login handling, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode palettes, and utility classes including safe-area helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/androidBridge.ts: Provides safe wrappers for sending prayer data to Android WebView bridges, with validation and fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/nativeNotifications.t: Wraps Android WebView bridge calls for notifications and app info with safe fallbacks for browsers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash params, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, features, and pending requests in a structured JSON format.
